roleset.name: To carry off by force

example.name: All args
example.text: There are several accounts of this event; however, all center around his abduction of an Amazon queen.

roleset.note: Framed by Claire. Maps to VN class steal-10.5, FrameNet Kidnapping. Based on verb entry abduct.01.

roleset.name: move away from a central axis
roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. No comparison. Framed by Katie.

example.name: Both args
example.text: His abduction of the left arm is impaired.
